sect1.title: MonthWeekNumFromDate

row.entry: The date (in Date_t format) for which to compute the week number.
Optional, The index number of the first day of a week, 1-7, where 1 = Sunday. Default is 1.
The 1-based week number of the date, relative to the beginning of the date's month.

sect1.para: The WeekNumFromDate function returns the 1-based week number of a date within the date's month. Week 1 always contains the first day of the month, and week 2 begins on the following day of the week indicated by the value of startingDayOfWeek.
This is not an ISO-8601 implementation of computing week numbers ("week dates").
